message: Hi Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this great product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $10,000 is fair. What do you think?
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $7,500. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
Thanks for your offer, Bob.  I understand your perspective, but I can't go as low as $7,500. Would you consider meeting me halfway at $8,750?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $8,750, but I was thinking we could meet at $8,250. Would that be something you'd consider?
